title: S2 Ep25: Cash transfers and child health
itunes:title: Cash transfers and child health
description: Children in low-income countries are 12 times more likely to die before their fifth birthday than those in high-income countries. Cash transfers to households may increase money spent on the health of children â€“ but how large are the outcomes, and should the transfers specifically target child health? Anupama Dathan talks to Tim Phillips.
